name: Polerity
description:
A penguin and a polar bear, not a dream team as you can imagine. 
But together they have to defend their ice planet from incoming waves of meteors.

Polerity is a two  player, local coop, survival, somewhat "tower defense" game.
The penguin is smart and can build machines to fight the meteors and the polar bear is strong and fights the incoming danger with pure muscle power.

Sometimes the two characters have to work together, but then you have to disguise you as the oposite player, because polar bears and penguins... no one nows...
